body_html: @GPhilo We've fixed this issue in the internal branch, and it should appear at HEAD soon. (Follow #12396 to see when the commit lands.) After the fix, the behavior of Dataset.map() will be the same if a function returns a tuple or a list containing the same elements, and the tuple(...) workaround will no longer be necessary.

body: @GPhilo We've fixed this issue in the internal branch, and it should appear at HEAD soon. (Follow #12396 to see when the commit lands.) After the fix, the behavior of `Dataset.map()` will be the same if a function returns a tuple or a list containing the same elements, and the `tuple(...)` workaround will no longer be necessary.
